010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.threshold.Thresholder;
014
015/**
016 * TODO: convert to interface.
017 * @author WB
018 * @version 2022/04/02
019 *
020 */
021public abstract class GlobalThresholder extends Thresholder {
022        
023        // must be implemented by concrete subclasses
024        protected abstract int getThreshold(int[] h);
025        
026        public int getThreshold(ByteProcessor bp) {
027                int[] h = bp.getHistogram();
028                return getThreshold(h);
029        }
030        
031        public boolean threshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
032                int q = getThreshold(ip);
033                if (q > 0) {
034                        ip.threshold(q);
035                        return true;
036                }
037                else {
038                        return false;
039                }
040        }
041        
042}
